mapper.select: SELECT cidx as seq FROM ( SELECT cidx, row_number() over(order by writeday desc) AS rno FROM commu ) WHERE rno = 1
mapper.insert: insert into commu(cidx, userid, category, title, content, writeday, updateday, commentcount) values(seq_cidx.nextval, #{userid}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, default, default, default)
insert into commufiles(cidx, filename, orgname, filesize) values(#{cidx}, #{fileName}, #{orgFilename}, #{fileSize})

select cidx, category, title, commentcount, userid, content, to_char(to_date(writeday, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') as writeday, viewcnt from commu where 1=1
and category = #{category}
and ( lower(title) like '%'||lower(#{title})||'%' )
and ( lower(content) like '%'||lower(#{content})||'%' )
and ( lower(userid) like '%'||lower(#{userid})||'%' )
and ( lower(word) like '%'||lower(#{word})||'%' )
select distinct(A.cidx) from commu A JOIN commufiles B ON A.cidx = B.cidx
